roles.title: Software Engineer

company.name: Teleste
company.description: Broadband network solutions and video technology

roles.description: Software engineer on broadband R&D team. Built scalable components for access-network solutions. Optimized caching systems to reduce configuration latency. Created testing frameworks and CI/CD improvements. Systems serve millions of broadband users globally.
highlights: Developed scalable software components for access-network solutions
Optimized caching systems reducing configuration latency
Built comprehensive testing frameworks and QA processes
Contributed to CI/CD pipeline optimization

roles.title: Co-Founder

highlights: Co-founded Northern Europe's premier AI innovation platform
Secured strategic partnerships with global technology leaders
Designed cutting-edge hackathon programs
Built community engagement in AI ecosystem
